text: Hans Oldag (March 2, 1901 - August 1978) was a German-born American long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:American male long- distance runners Category:American male marathon runners Category:Olympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:People from Ludwigslust-Parchim Category:German emigrants to the United States
title: Hans Oldag
